name: English curry
instructions: - Whip the yolks (whites are excess) with the sugar until it develops soft peaks.
- Incorporate the mascarpone, whip slowly then faster for 3 minutes. Cream shouldn't be pourable, but consistent.
- Spread thin layer of cream on the bottom to avoid coffee leaks.
- Dip the ladyfingers once on the coffee, quickly, drain them vertically and place them.
- Add cream until the ladyfingers are hidden, repeat.
- Finally, add cacao powder on top.
variants: Substitute the Savoiardi for pan di Spagna (bizcocho, Spanish sponge cake)

culinary: It's a sin to throw away the whites! Conserve them in the fridge. They are high in protein and can be added to scrambled eggs, used for Amaretti biscuits, etc.
